page.title: 05INDUSTRY IN FENISCOWLES (1)
page.content: Although Feniscowles, Blackburn, is primarily a residential area there are three major industrial units. These are two paper mills and a fuel oil depot. Hargreaves Fuel Oil has been in Feniscowles for about 25 years. They are situated on the banks of the Leeds/Liverpool Canal adjacent to a main road, Livesey Branch Road. The firm distribute gas oil for industrial and domestic uses. The gas oil comes from Ellesmere Port, near Liverpool, and is taken to all parts of Lancashire. Hargreaves employ only two full time staff and two drivers, but they take on extra staff in their busiest time, winter.
